item.title: Why do Black people need a special month or holiday? How would you all feel if there was a white history month, huh?
item.description: What would a “white” history month celebrate, exactly? Whiteness was invented by Europeans who wanted to assure a portion of their workers that they weren’t under threat of becoming disposable slaves like the others; the distinguishing quality of whiteness is its social relation to blackness.
